entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Westport
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:29 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -9.5°C

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
